reviews.text: Accidentally found this gem when looked for a traditional restaurant. It has a nice garden where the tables are separated by some hedge-like bushes. The waiter was a bit grumpy and slow, but the food was delicious and fine. Stray cats were running around. The building has some charm but needs a renovation with the garden. A grill plate for two persons plus some beer costed appr. 120 RON. Credit cards accepted.

Nice place to have a male especially in the summer since they have garden. You will also see some kittens if you are lucky enough. The place is quite fancy in my opinion but I was there for a celebration so that’s might be why it left me this impression. The waiters were very welcoming!
A historic building housed the restaurant. Although the food was well-cooked, I had to wait longer. However, I enjoyed the amazing architecture.

Beautiful old House of Assan is now Casa Oamenilor de Stiinta, looks great old style, but somehow like they don't take care so much about it. Being in the middle of the city of Bucharest, should look at their old reputation, one of a kind in the whole city!
Food is very good, atmosphere depends on who is with you, service looks a bit from other epoque.

Lovely space, not great not terrible food. The starter for two people is pretty small and the chicken soup is tasteless. I wouldn't recommend this place for a meal, but just to enjoy the space and the garden.
